lebananaye wesena shri lankikayan sambandhayen nirantharayen soya bala awashya kadinam kriyamarga ganimata sudanam bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.erata aarakshawa sambandhayen athiwi thibena thaththwaya pilibandawa awadhanaya yomu karana shri lanka rajaya shri lankikayan sambandhayen nirantharayen soya balana lesa erata shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya danuwath kara thibena bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya sandahan karayi.lebananaye sewaya karana shri lankikayan kisiwakutath me dakwa kisindu hiriharayak siduwi nomathi athara ee sambandhayen anawashya biyak athikaragatha yuthu nathayida widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral sarath disanayaka mahatha dinamina ta pawasiya.kese wuwada lebananaye sewaya karana shri lankiyan sambandhayen nirantharayen soya balana lesath adala thorathuru widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya wetha labadena lesath shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya danuwathkara thibena bawa pawasu disanayaka mahatha idiriyedi kisiyam awadanam thaththwayak athiwuwahoth shri lankikayange aarakshawa sandaha kshanika kriyamarga ganna bawada wisheshayenma shri lankikayan danuwath kirimata mehidi kriyamarga gena thibena bawada prakasha kaleya.wideshiya sankramanika shramikayange aarakshawa sambandhayen lebananaye shri lanka thanapathi ranjith gunarathna mahatha erata widesha katayuthu amathiwaraya samanga me wanawitath sakachcha kara thibena bawada ehi di shri lankikayange aarakshawa kerehi wishesha awadhanayak yomukara thibena bawada wartha weyi.me wanawita paya 24 purama lebananaye thaththwaya pilibandawa suparikshakariwa sitina bawada hadisi thaththwayak pana nangunahoth awashya kriyamarga ganima sandaha kandayam sudanam kara athayida erata shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya pawasayi.me wanawita shri lankikayo 80,000 pamana lebananayehi sewaya karathi. .

issara dhiwara yathra 75kin pamana sidu kala me dhiwara sampatha kolla kama ada wana wita dhiwara yathra 150k pamana yoda ganimin, thahanam aampanna, thahanam widhikrama yodagena wishala parisara haniyak ha jaiwa wiwidhathwayata wishala lesa hani karamin muhude mathsya sampathata da wishala haniyak sidu kirimata me indiya dhiwara mafiyawa katayuthu karanawa.me thaththwaya palanaya kirimata apahasu wi aththe dakunu indiyawe jayalalitha - karunanidhi athulu prabala deshapalanagnyayange anugrahaya me dhiwara ;kallayata noaduwa labena nisayi.
